getSelectedFile

public static java.io.File getSelectedFile(java.lang.String[] fileFormat,
                                           boolean save)
Shows a filechooser window prompting the user for a directory location.

Parameters:
fileFormat - The supported file formats
save - true if a save window is requested false for open
Returns:
the selected file

getSelectedFiles

public static java.io.File[] getSelectedFiles(java.lang.String[] fileFormat,
                                              boolean save)
Shows a filechooser window prompting the user for one or more directory location.

Parameters:
fileFormat - the supported file formats
save - save true if a save window is requested false for open
Returns:
the selected files as an array of File's
